Name: ReverieTale
About the game: I want to be the best in another world. The main character, who thought 'the real world is boring' and 'I can't cum', is reincarnated into a different world without any warning. It was home to an island in the air and countless monsters that would attack without hesitation. Only a sword in each hand and sword skill that can be used only by the person holding the sword can defeat an enemy that is attacking you. Defeat all your enemies and become the strongest 'Ikirist' as you go to battle against the unknown enemy... Slay enemies with the sword! A simple hack&slash action game! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Operating Instructions Button selection: right stick up/down Decision: Right trigger (left trigger is also used for equipment screen only) Back: B button Screen switching: left or right grip button ï¼œBattle> Movement: left stick Camera rotation: right stick left/right Attack: Shake the controller when approaching an enemy Evasion: left trigger while moving Sword skill command activation: A button Item selection screen: press and hold the left grip button to activate, press the left stick up and down to select, and press the left trigger. Use the item Sword skill selection screen: press and hold right grip button to activate, right stick up/down to select, right trigger Decided by ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ It works with Oculus Rift, Oculus RiftS and Oculus Quest (Oculus Link) . Play from a standing position in a space where you can reach out with both hands and not hit anything around you. It is automatically saved when the wave is cleared. You can end the game by pressing the escape key.
